alert.note: Alert for Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:52AM CDT until April 05 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Smith County in northeastern Texas... Wood County in northeastern Texas... Western Upshur County in northeastern Texas... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 751 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Quitman to near Van to near Athens, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tyler, Whitehouse, Gladewater, Gilmer, Mineola, Lindale, Quitman, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Lake Fork Reservoir, Hainesville, Golden, Rosewood, Hoard, Lake Palestine, Forest Hill, Noonday, New Chapel Hill, Winona and Midway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
